values.value:
The definition of "done" for a User Story for a QA Engineer is:
- It must have the Title and should not be blank - It must have the Project and should not be blank - It must have the Team and should not be blank - It must have the Theme and should not be blank - It must have the Feature and should not be blank - It must have the Planned Points and should not be blank - It must have the Actual Points and should not be blank - It must have the Status and should not be blank and should be 'Approved' - It must have the As a and should not be blank - It must have the Want to and should not be blank - It must have the So that and should not be blank - It must have the Release and should not be blank - It must have the Functional Specifications and should not be blank
